meanings.definition: Saurians: a type of reptile, typically referring to dinosaurs

meanings.sent2: Scientists study saurians to learn more about prehistoric creatures that roamed the earth long ago.

meanings.definition: Saurians: relating to or characteristic of reptiles, especially dinosaurs
